channel.title: I need To Change Defence On items, How Do I?
channel.description:
All my armour has no defence sence at all i can wear barrows at lvl 1 and so with eveything else
Same with my Crystal Bow and Dragon weapons they can wield at lvl 1
How do I change this so Its much better
Please Help/ Kilopy :)

item.title: I need To Change Defence On items, How Do I?
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

Not equipment stats its the level to wear them, it’s all done in client.java but I’m too lazy to find where. XD

Read full topic
item.source: I need To Change Defence On items, How Do I?

item.title: I need To Change Defence On items, How Do I?
item.dc:creator: @moparnewb moparnewb
item.description:
@moparnewb wrote:

you dont need to use the item handler when you want to set some other bonuses you need the item.cfg search the item and change the numbers at the last the first 3 numbers for the price and the other numbers for the equipment stats

Read full topic
